channel.title: Eastport|Boundary County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Eastport|Boundary County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-Canada Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada Border. For Reentry Information Requests turn left to access US Customs. Continue straight ahead for Canada Customs.

item.title: US-95 North - Eastport
item.description: Entering Eastport on US-95 north. Speed Limit 25 MPH.

item.title: US-95 North - Commercial Vehicles Stop At Customs
item.description: US-95 North - All Commercial Vehicles Stop At Customs approaching US-Canada boundary at Eastport.

item.title: US-95 at Boundary St. - Continue Ahead For Canada
item.description: US-95 approaching international boundary in Eastport. Stay on US-95 for Canada.

item.title: US-95 - U.S. Border Station, Eastport, Idaho
item.description: US-95 north at the US Border Station - Eastport, Idaho.

item.title: US-95 Leaving US Customs
item.description: US-95 shield at exit of US Customs at Port of Eastport. Turn right for US-95 and to leave US Customs facility.

item.title: US-95 North - US Border Station Parking
item.description: US-95 north at US Border Station Visitor Parking, at the US-Canada boundary in Eastport.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-Canada Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada Border. For Reentry Information Requests turn left to access US Customs. Continue straight ahead for Canada Customs.
